Posts.Content: CharlieGirrl wrote: Hi, I was just diagnosed with Stage 1 breast cancer. Had Stage 1A uterine cancer less than a year ago. A hysterectomy took care of the uterine cancer, but now I am dealing with deciding the treatment for the breast cancer. I live in the Washington, DC area/Northern Virginia. I'm looking for a breast center/surgeon for a second opinion. Does anyone have any recommendations or positive or negative to help me decide where to go? I've met with a breast surgeon (who diagnosed me), had the genetics testing (awaiting the results), and a breast MRI. Any thoughts anyone can provide is GREATLY appreciated. My head is spinning! Thank you. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Seeking a center for treatment CharlieGirrl dtad
